name: Jet Dog
description: Send your dog flying as far through the air as possible with a stroke of the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢ stylus and unlock the equipment that will let you beat all the distance records. A simple, quick, funny and extremely addictive game for the entire family. - Catapult your doggy and avoid the obstacles to go as far as possible. - Three different dogs with distinct capabilities. - Capes, helmets, skateboards, skis, surfboards, guitars... Choose from lots of accessories to improve the performance of your stuntdogs and beat your records.
